name: Biscuits and gravy
steps: Bake biscuits according to steps on can
Cook sausage in a large skillet over medium heat until thoroughly heated, stirring frequently, about 5 to 6 minutes.
Stir in flour until well combined.
Gradually add milk, stirring continuously, until the gravy thickens and comes to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer and stir for 2 more minutes
Season to taste with salt and pepper.

name: Sweet Pork Tacos
steps: Add pork, 1 cup drpepper,water, garlic, onion, chili powder to instant pot
Cook on high for 3+ hours. Crockpot (5-6 hours)
Drain liquid and shred pork with fork

BLEND: ¾ cup coke, brown sugar, chili powder
,green chiles
, and enchilada sauce in blender or by hand
Add to instant pot and cook on simmer for 30 min longer
